posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bonnie
Want Rudy Baerwald cards or other items

Posted By: Mike
According to the Card Catalog he is on 4 cards: 1909 Colgan's Chips Stars of the Diamond ( E 254), 1909 Colgan's Chips - Square Proofs, 1915 Zeenut Pacific Coast League and 1919 Winkelman's Quaker Bread Pins. Sorry I don't have any in stock. Mike

Posted By: Todd Schultz
here's a scan of the E254 (sorry, not for sale):
[IMG]http://i239.photobucket.com/albums/ff265/nolemmings/09e254baerwald.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Bonnie
 Thanks for the picture and info ! Bonnie

Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
The Winkelman pins are a 1909 issue, the 1919 date listed in the SCD is a mistake, they just accidently put a "1" where a "0" was supposed to be. The cool thing about Baerwald is that when he played in the Major Leagues he went by the name John Bell.

-Rhett

Also not for sale, but your best bet with the items he is pictured on is the E254 Colgan's Chip, he is a fairly common minor leaguer in that set.
[IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/e254baerwald.JPG[/IMG]

Posted By: Bonnie
I have the Colgans E254 now ! Thanks Bonnie
